OUTLINE : Patients randomize 1 2 treatment arm . - Sulforaphane Supplement : Patients receive oral broccoli sprout extract supplementation three time daily 2-8 week absence unacceptable toxicity . - Placebo : Patients receive oral placebo supplementation three time daily 2-8 week absence unacceptable toxicity . Blood urine sample collect baseline completion study treatment laboratory biomarker study . Patients schedule undergo surgery ( mastectomy lumpectomy ) also undergo breast tissue sample collection baseline time surgery . Samples analyze sulforaphane metabolism ( isothiocyanate level ) , HDAC activity ( acetylate histone expression ) , cell proliferation ( Ki-67 index IHC ) , apoptosis ( TUNEL assay ) .
